headline: BCA Research looks at potential "black swan" events facing markets in 2026
summary: Investing.com - Stock market declines which force U.S. policy changes may be shallower in 2026 as the Trump administration looks ahead to crucial midterm elections in November, according to analysts at BCA Research.

headline: Technicals Point to Buying Opportunity for Former Stock Picks
summary: As markets rotate toward value, many of the old favorites investors once overlooked are quietly setting up as opportunities.  Stocks that lagged the tech-driven rally of the past few years are showing constructive technical patterns and attractive relative strength, offering a second look from our picks last year.  With the broader market favoring sectors like energy, industrials, and consumer staples, revisiting these prior picks can reveal opportunities where patience and timing may be rewarded.
